channel.title: What? (Xstream loading issue)
channel.description:
I get this when I try to load an xml file that contains the doors in the game.
[code=java]com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.ConversionException: location : location ---- Debugging information ---- message : location cause-exception : com.thoughtworks.xstream.mapper.CannotResolveClassException cause-message : location class : [Lorg.rs2server.rs2.model.Location; required-type : [Lorg.rs2server.rs2.model.Location; converter-type : com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.collections.ArrayConverter path : /list/door/locations/location line number : 30 class[1] : org.rs2server.rs2.model.Door converter-type[1] : com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.ReflectionConverter class[2] : java.util.ArrayList converter-type[2] : com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.collections.CollectionConverter version : null -------------------------------[/code]

item.title: What? (Xstream loading issue)
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

I get this when I try to load an xml file that contains the doors in the game.
